org.platanios.learn.optimization.function

Class LinearLeastSquaresFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.optimization.function.AbstractFunction

        • org.platanios.learn.optimization.function.LinearLeastSquaresFunction

  • public final class LinearLeastSquaresFunction
extends AbstractLeastSquaresFunction
    A linear least squares function of the form \(f(x)=\frac{1}{2}\|Jx-y\|^2\).
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios
